To our Parents/Guardians who have requested devices for remote learning.

Please know that the Tech Team is working daily on preparing the devices that have been asked for to meet student needs. The number of devices requested is high and we ask for your patience as we continue to work to properly prepare the devices for our students. We anticipate starting to issue devices by the middle of this next week. Device assignment and type will be prioritized based on student and family needs.

div.p: When new information is added to PowerSchool, it is updated nightly to SchoolMessenger at 11:00 pm.

Text Messaging – Our schools utilize the SchoolMessenger system to deliver text messages, straight to your mobile phone with important information about events, school closings, safety alerts and more. You can participate in this free service just by sending a text message of “Y” or “Yes” to our school’s short code number, 67587. You can also opt out of these messages at any time by simply replying to one of our messages with “Stop."
